video.title: Chowder
video.synopsis: This animated series centers on a "catbearrabbit" named Chowder, a chef-in-training who can't resist gobbling up everything he sees.

episodes.synopsis: When Panini sets her love-struck eyes on Chowder, he tries every trick he can think of to convince her that he's not her boyfriend.
episodes.title: The Froggy Apple Crumple Thumpkin / Chowder's Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Payday is always Shnitzel's favorite day. But it becomes the worst day of his life when he takes Chowder along to the bank.
episodes.title: Burple Nurples / Shnitzel Makes a Deposit

episodes.synopsis: When Chowder discovers a lonely monster in the forest, the whole gang soon has to find a way to escape from their emotionally needy new "friend.
episodes.title: Grubble Gum / The Cinnamini Monster

episodes.synopsis: When Mung is forced to spend the day in Chef Certifrycation School, he butts heads with the instructor.
episodes.title: Certifrycation Class / Sing Beans

episodes.synopsis: During a seemingly normal delivery, Chowder's gut instincts lead him and Mung on a non-stop adventure through a strange and unfamiliar part of town.
episodes.title: The Wrong Address / The Wrong Customer

episodes.synopsis: Chowder learns that messing with Truffles' game night means certain doom. But he's willing to risk it all for a taste of her Mevilled Eggs.
episodes.title: Mahjongg Night / Stinky Love

episodes.synopsis: Mung cooks up a living Thrice Cream Man! But after a day of over-indulgent fun, Chowder's dream friend turns out to be a nightmare.
episodes.title: The Thrice Cream Man / The Flibber-Flabber Diet

episodes.synopsis: When Mung and Ms. Endive unveil the same dish at Marzipan City's biggest food fair, it's an all out food fight to decide whose is better.
episodes.title: Gazpacho Stands Up / A Taste of Marzipan

episodes.synopsis: A powerfully sour berry sends Chowder on a strange journey into his own mouth to save his beloved taste buds from some very tart invaders.
episodes.title: The Puckerberry Overlords / The Elemelons

episodes.synopsis: Truffles gives Mung the cold shoulder after he forgets their 450th wedding anniversary. Can Chowder bring the two lovebirds back together?
episodes.title: Sniffleball / Mung on the Rocks

episodes.synopsis: When Chowder accidentally puts Mung into a deep sleep, he and Shnitzel must race across town to find a cure before Truffles finds out.
episodes.title: The Heavy Sleeper / The Moldy Touch

episodes.synopsis: When Mung's best customer enlists Chowder to be his valet for the day, Chowder soon realizes he's met the one person who can eat more than him.
episodes.title: At Your Service / Chowder & Mr.Fugu

episodes.synopsis: When Chowder knocks his internal clock out of whack, he becomes an unstoppable Sleep Eater!
episodes.title: The Vacation / The Sleep Eater

episodes.synopsis: When Panini decides that an injured bluenana is their "baby," she uses it as an excuse to stay close to Chowder. Run Chowder, run!
episodes.title: The Bruised Bluenana / Shnitzel and the Lead Farfel

episodes.synopsis: When Reuben extorts the catering company, the gang have to figure out a way to make him leave before he drives all of them crazy.
episodes.title: The Thousand Pound Cake / The Rat Sandwich

episodes.synopsis: Mung attempts to curb Chowder's constant scatterbrained behavior. But when Mung makes him too smart, it could spell disaster for the kitchen!
episodes.title: Chowder Loses His Hat / Brain Grub

episodes.synopsis: Part 1: Shnitzel quits Mung's kitchen and goes to work for their rival, Endive. But he soon learns a valuable lesson about friendship.
episodes.title: Shnitzel Quits

episodes.synopsis: Mung sends Chowder to buy a replacement part for a broken machine, but Chowder's forgetful nature makes it a nearly impossible task.
episodes.title: The Broken Part / The Meach Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Part 2: Will Shnitzel ever go back to Mung's Catering Company? Will Mung and Chowder welcome him back? We need answers!
episodes.title: Banned From the Stand / Creme Puff Hands

episodes.synopsis: When Chowder and Gorgonzola are paired up at the annual Apprentice Games, they discover their opposing personalities lead to a winning formula.
episodes.title: The Apprentice Games

episodes.synopsis: Chowder finds himself used as a political pawn. / Shnitzel thinks he has killed Chowder while baby-sitting him.
episodes.title: Panini for President / Chowder's Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: After eating hot peppers, Chowder discovers he can breathe fire. / When an acrobat act comes to the kitchen, Chowder dreams of life in the circus.
episodes.title: The Fire Breather / The Flying Flinger Lingons

episodes.synopsis: The gang must appease some obnoxious trees to get syrup. / Chowder tries to save his junk from being sold at Mung and Truffles's garage sale.
episodes.title: The Arborians / The Garage Sale

episodes.synopsis: It's Knishmas, and Chowder wants an Electric Broccoli Trimmer with Detachable Non-Electric Cauliflower Trimmer. Because every kid wants one. Right?
episodes.title: Hey, Hey It's Knishmas!

episodes.synopsis: Chowder wants to start his own catering company for a bunch of vermin. / Chowder tries to convince Mung that a catchphrase makes food taste better.
episodes.title: Chowder's Catering Company / The Catch Phrase

episodes.synopsis: Sgt. Hoagie has a hot date -- and that's about all we should say about that. / Mung, Chowder and Shnitzel lose their minds shopping.
episodes.title: The Hot Date / Shopping Spree

episodes.synopsis: Mung takes Chowder and Shnitzel on a fishing trip. / Mung's old cooking master tells about Mung's greatest cooking failure.
episodes.title: The Party Cruise / Won-Ton Bombs

episodes.synopsis: Truffles tries to impress the members of an exclusive ladies club called The Big Hat Biddies. But guess who messes everything up. Go on, guess!
episodes.title: The Big Hat Biddies / The Deadly Maze

episodes.synopsis: Mung goes way out of his way to help Chowder pass a test. / Truffles gets a new voice.
episodes.title: The B.L.T.'s / The Trouble with Truffles

episodes.synopsis: When you invite Chowder to a "whodunit" dinner theatre night, you should probably explain the concept of "theater" to him first.
episodes.title: The Dinner Theater

episodes.synopsis: Shnitzel reverts to being a kid in order to avoid work. / Chowder stands up to a rude customer.
episodes.title: Kid Shnitzel / Gazpacho Fights Back

episodes.synopsis: The gang is catering a big sports event? What kind you ask? No idea. Then Chowder gets frozen in a block of ice and gets the ultimate brain freeze.
episodes.title: Big Ball / The Brain Freeze

episodes.synopsis: You ever see two Snail Cars race? Well you're about to. Also, Chowder goes through a lot of teeth in order to satisfy his love of lollistops.
episodes.title: The Snail Car / The Lollistops

episodes.synopsis: Boy does Miss Endive have a big secret. We're talking really big. Soooo big. Like THIS big. Also Chowder catches a reclusive Bigfood monster.
episodes.title: Endive's Dirty Secret / Big Food

episodes.synopsis: Chowder creates a magical painting, then he works to recover all of Marzipan City from a blackout. Boy is that kid resourceful.
episodes.title: Paint the Town / The Blackout

episodes.synopsis: Never ever, ever, open a chain letter or cook a chain recipe. And never ever, ever blame something on Ceviche. It's all explained right here.
episodes.title: The Dice Cycle / The Chain Recipe

episodes.synopsis: Truffles takes on Chowder as her apprentice in the garden and Mung is none too happy. Then lonely Miss Endive cooks herself up a man. Yikes.
episodes.title: The Garden / Sheboodles!

episodes.synopsis: Gazpacho has a falling out with his mother, so he moves in to the Catering Company. Gazpacho still lives at home? Wow. Did not expect that.
episodes.title: Gazpacho Moves In / My Big Fat Stinky Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Chowder thinks he has found his inner voice. But it sounds weird. And Mung decides to throw a party in Chowder's honor, but it goes so terribly wrong.
episodes.title: Apprentice Appreciation Day / The Grape Worm

episodes.synopsis: Panini gets a little jealous of the new girl. OK, a lot jealous. And guess who used to be a samurai bodyguard? Shnitzel. That's who.
episodes.title: A Faire to Remember / Tofu-Town Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Chowder and Mung square off in a contest to win a fancy mixer. / The gang must deliver a crate of dangerous Blast Raz fruit to Mr. Fugu.
episodes.title: Hands on a Big Mixer/The Blast Raz

episodes.synopsis: Gung-ho Gazpacho puts Chowder and the other scouts through a ridiculously difficult ordeal. / Chowder unwittingly cooks up a ferocious guard dog.
episodes.title: The Apprentice Scouts/The Belgian Waffle Slobber-Barker

episodes.synopsis: Chowder must make a delivery to the creepiest house in town. / The spirit of a wicked chicken dish takes possession of Chowder's soul.
episodes.title: The Spookiest House in Marzipan/Poultry Geist

episodes.synopsis: A magic spice causes Chowder, Schnitzel, Mung and Truffles to switch bodies. / The gang finds themselves naked in the middle of the city.
episodes.title: A Little Bit of Pizzazz!/The Birthday Suits

episodes.synopsis: Chowder and his pals try to secretly excavate a treasure of candy gems hidden beneath Endive's house. / Endive plays one trick too many on Mung.
episodes.title: The Heist/The Prank

episodes.synopsis: Not wanting to age, Chowder vows to stop Old Man Thyme in his tracks. / Schnitzel, Mung and Truffles compete to be on the cover of Chowder's magazine.
episodes.title: Old Man Thyme/Chowder's Magazine

episodes.synopsis: Chowder tries to liven up a boring weekend at Schnitzel's house. / Mung loses his sense of taste and drafts Chowder to be his taster.
episodes.title: Weekend at Schnitzel's/Taste Buds

episodes.synopsis: Chowder catches a glimpse of his life twenty years down the road and determines that now is the time to start acting responsibly.
episodes.title: Chowder Grows Up

episodes.synopsis: Gazpacho leaps into action when mysterious ninjas kidnap his mother. / A gas-inducing fruit turns Chowder into an unlikely musical sensation.
episodes.title: Gazpacho!/The Toots
